name: Gravity Jump: Space Adventure
description:
Go beyond the darkness of deep space on a mission aboard the (Cargo Ship) CS-Helium.

Power-up your Astronaut and fix the wreck done to your space shuttle.

Features

  • Unique Environments and level structure.
  • Engaging plot and scenario.
  • Epic music and sounds
  • Stages with bunch of secrets.
  • Solve different puzzles.
  • Select among 4-5 power-up suits

Be ready to take down the ultra-mechanical monstrosity. Upbeat ways to end levels and proceed to your destination. Obtain keycards, push boxes turn off security lasers & electro charged gates.

Obtain a bunch of spacesuits to overcome the levels in amazing and flashy ways. Collect all three stars and increase your chance to reach the endgame boss.

In this game you play as an astronaut whose ship has been invaded by an unknown alien life form. Your colleague has went ahead to investigate the point of invasion and has called for help. Now it is up to you to clear out the mystery and help your friend and the space shuttle from the assailant.

New Arsenal of spacesuits in latest updates

Regular content updates.
